cms.contentitemcommondata.BasicItemShortDescription: An announcement about a new hands-on, practical how-to guide on SaaS for technical personas.
cms.contentitemcommondata.BasicItemTitle: New Walkthrough: Get Up and Running with Xperience by Kentico SaaS Projects

practical walkthrough shows you exactly how to:

* Set up and navigate your SaaS project in the Xperience Portal.
* Install and configure a SaaS-ready project locally.
* Create a deployment package for non-production and production environments.
* Use the powerful Xperience Portal API to keep your project updated.
